Uses of Interface
display.FocusComponent

  • Packages that use FocusComponent 
    Package Description
    display  
    grid  

    • Uses of FocusComponent in display

      Classes in display that implement FocusComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GUIFocus
      The main focus of the Asphodel Sky GUI, this is where the grid is based.

    • Uses of FocusComponent in grid

      Constructors in grid with parameters of type FocusComponent 
      Constructor and Description
      Grid(FocusComponent fc)
      Creates an empty grid with default dimensions.
      Grid(int height, int width, FocusComponent fc)
      Creates an empty grid with set dimensions.
